title: 【1.8】手榴弹验证机制，解决杀怪后掉经验爆炸问题
author: tyson
txt_content:
大家好，今天我为大家带来  手榴弹验证机制：解决杀怪后掉经验爆炸问题




http://player.youku.com/player.php/sid/XNjY0NDA3Njg4/v.swf



常规的代码

1.
/clear @p minecraft:filled_map复制代码2.
/give @p minecraft:map复制代码3.
 /tellraw @p {text:"[非手榴弹模式]",color:yellow,clickEvent:{action:run_command,value:"/scoreboard players set @p RenWu 1 "}}复制代码4.
 /tellraw @p {text:"[手榴弹模式]",color:yellow,clickEvent:{action:run_command,value:"/scoreboard players set @p RenWu 2 "}}复制代码5
/testfor @p[score_RenWu_min=2]复制代码6.
/testfor @e[type=XPOrb,r=200]复制代码7.
/summon Fireball ~ ~5 ~ {direction: [0.0,-1.0,0.0],ExplosionPower:10}复制代码8.
tp @e[type=Fireball,r=15] @e[type=XPOrb,r=200,c=1]复制代码9.
kill @e[type=XPOrb,r=200]复制代码
